description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: In ril service, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local denial of service with System execution privileges needed

En el servicio ril, existe una posible escritura fuera de los límites debido a una verificación de los límites faltantes. Esto podría provocar una denegación de servicio local con privilegios de ejecución del System necesarios.
